author: larryi
msg: Modify to not set TOMCAT_HOME so tomcat.bat can always guess if
TOMCAT_HOME hasn't been set by the user.

author: larryi
msg: Fix "jspc" option to include setting environment.
Always clean up internal environment variables.

author: costin
msg: Small fix in SimpleHashtable, we can have calls to nextElement without hasMore.

author: costin
msg: Bug fix - under certain conditions the POST data was messed up. This
doesn't happen with browsers, but it did happened with the test application,
because the body was sent in a different tcp packet. We do receive a
body packet just after the headers ( we could delay that - in ajp14 ), and
Improved debugging ( part of the search for the bug )
